Interface IServerEmailDemon


  • public interface IServerEmailDemon
    This methods are called if the mails are fetched.

    • Method Detail

      • messageChange

        Vector messageChange(Connection con,
                   Vector param,
                   String body)
        Is called if a email will be received.
        Parameters:
        con - connection of a database
        param - parameter that contain at position 0=Header of new email 1= project id 2= email account id 3=new email
        body - body of the new email
        Returns:
        Vector that can contain at position 0 = from, 1 = subject, 3 = replyTo, 4 = first name, 5 = name

      • foundFilter

        Vector foundFilter(Connection con,
                 Filter filter,
                 Question question)
        Is called if a filter has been found.
        Parameters:
        connection - of a database
        founded - filter
        question - the current question
        Returns:
        Vector that can contain at position 0 = subproject id of filter 1 = folder id 2 = status 3=priority

      • preAutoReplySend

        HashMap<String,Object> preAutoReplySend(Connection con,
                                      Question question,
                                      Question autoreply,
                                      Customer customer,
                                      Subproject subproject,
                                      HashMap<String,Object> map)
        Is called before an auto reply will be sent.
        Parameters:
        con - connection of a database
        question - the question that contain address whom a auto replay will be sent
        autoreply - question that will be replay
        customer - customer of the current question
        subproject - of the question
        map - PARAM_AUTOREPLY_SEND true if the auto reply is allowed, false otherwise
        Returns:
        key PARAM_AUTOREPLY_ACTION

      • preExportExternalClassificator

        boolean preExportExternalClassificator(Connection con,
                                     Question question,
                                     Map<String,Object> map)
        Is called before mails which are fetched from Email-Daemon put to export interface for the external classification.
        Parameters:
        con - connection of a database
        question - the current email
        map - not in use, irrelevant
        Returns:
        true if the export can be started, false otherwise

      • postExportExternalClassificator

        HashMap<String,Object> postExportExternalClassificator(Connection con,
                                                     Question question,
                                                     Map<String,Object> map)
        Is called after mails, which are collected by email deamon has been put to export interface for external. classification.
        Parameters:
        con - connection of a database
        question - the current email
        map - not in use, irrelevant
        Returns:
        not in use, irrelevant

      • preImportExternalClassificator

        boolean preImportExternalClassificator(Connection con,
                                     Project project,
                                     Map<String,Object> map)
        Is called before the mails from external classification will be imported
        Parameters:
        con - connection of a database
        project - project of the question
        map - not currently used
        Returns:
        true, if the import can be started

      • postImportExternalClassificator

        HashMap<String,Object> postImportExternalClassificator(Connection con,
                                                     Project project,
                                                     List<Question> importedQuestions,
                                                     Map<String,Object> map)
        Is called after the mails have been imported from external classification
        Parameters:
        con - connection of a database
        project - project of the question
        importedQuestions - list of the questions that will be imported
        map - not currently used
        Returns:
        if a map contains key "refilter" with boolean value "true", imported questions will be stored and filtered after classification

      • preFilterQuestion

        List<Object> preFilterQuestion(Connection con,
                             Question question,
                             Project project,
                             Account account,
                             Map<String,Object> map)
        Is called before a question will be filtered.
        Parameters:
        con - connection of a database
        question - question that will be filtered
        project - project of the question
        account - email account of project
        map - not in use, irrelevant
        Returns:
        list that contain at position 0 = Filter 1= if true, the filter can be used
        was:
        preFrageFiltern

      • checkInformationMessages

        boolean checkInformationMessages(Connection con,
                               IEmail orgin,
                               Question found_question,
                               Answer found_answer)
        Is called if the sending of the mail was failed.
        Parameters:
        con - connection of a database
        orgin - the question that will be sent
        found_question - the question that will be sought
        found_answer - the answer that will be sought
        Returns:
        true if the email is a smtp message(may not be fetched), false otherwise

      • getExternalId

        String getExternalId(Connection con,
                   IEmail mail)
        Will extract an external id for customer who send the question. You must return the empty string or null to identify the customer by his email address.
        Parameters:
        con - connection of a database
        mail - the current question
        Returns:
        externa id as string

      • externalReplyReceived

        void externalReplyReceived(Connection con,
                         Question original_question,
                         Question external_answer,
                         Answer answer_proposal)
        MX-2823 Ã¤nderung Is called after a mail, which is fetched from Email-Daemon, is marked as external reply.
        Parameters:
        con - connection of a database
        original_question - the original question from the customer
        external_answer - the answer from an External address
        answer_proposal - the original answer attached to the original question
